targets.query:
from(bucket: "LPS_Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "iteration_final_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["plan_name"], set: ${plan_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["round_name"], set: ${round_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["iteration_name"], set: ${iteration_name:json}))
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["iteration_name"], set: ${iteration_name:json}))

targets.query:

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cumulative_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric"] == "total_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "avg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["plan_name"], set: ${plan_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["round_name"], set: ${round_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["iteration_name"], set: ${iteration_name:json}))

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cumulative_requests")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "successful_count" or r["_field"] == "failed_count")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["round_name"], set: ${round_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["iteration_name"], set: ${iteration_name:json}))
  |> last()

panels.title: Data Received

targets.query:
from(bucket: "LPS_Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cumulative_requests")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["plan_name"], set: ${plan_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["round_name"], set: ${round_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["iteration_name"], set: ${iteration_name:json}))

  // Keep ONLY metadata (no fields, no _value)
|> keep(columns: [
  "_time",
  "plan_name",
  "round_name",
  "iteration_name",
  "target"
])
|> rename(columns: {
  _time: "Timestamp",
  plan_name: "Plan",
  round_name: "Round",
  iteration_name: "Iteration",
  target: "Target URL"
})

  // Deterministic row selection
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 1)

  // Flatten for Grafana
  |> group()

from(bucket: "LPS_Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cumulative_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["plan_name"], set: ${plan_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["round_name"], set: ${round_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["iteration_name"], set: ${iteration_name:json}))
  |> last()
  |> pivot(
      rowKey: ["metric"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> keep(columns: [
      "metric",
      "min",
      "avg",
      "p50",
      "p90",
      "p95",
      "p99",
      "max"
  ])
  |> rename(columns: {
  metric: "Metric",
  avg: "Avg (ms)",
  min: "Min (ms)",
  max: "Max (ms)",
  p50: "P50 (ms)",
  p90: "P90 (ms)",
  p95: "P95 (ms)",
  p99: "P99 (ms)"
})

  |> group()

from(bucket: "LPS_Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cumulative_requests")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["plan_name"], set: ${plan_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["round_name"], set: ${round_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["iteration_name"], set: ${iteration_name:json}))
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value"])
  |> pivot(
      rowKey: [],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> rename(columns: {
  error_rate: "Error Rate (%)",
  failed_count: "Failed Requests",
  successful_count: "Successful Requests",
  requests_count: "Total Requests",
  requests_per_second: "Requests / Second",
  requests_rate_per_cooldown: "Requests / Window",
  max_concurrent_requests: "Max Concurrent Requests"
})

  |> drop(columns: ["time_elapsed_ms"])
  |> group()

from(bucket: "LPS_Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cumulative_response_codes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["plan_name"], set: ${plan_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["round_name"], set: ${round_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["iteration_name"], set: ${iteration_name:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["status_code", "status_reason"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["status_code", "status_reason", "_value"])
|> rename(columns: {
    _value: "Count",
    status_code: "HTTP Status",
    status_reason: "Reason"
})
  |> group()   // ðŸ”´ THIS IS THE KEY LINE

from(bucket: "LPS_Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cumulative_data_transfer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["plan_name"], set: ${plan_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["round_name"], set: ${round_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["iteration_name"], set: ${iteration_name:json}))
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value"])
  |> pivot(
      rowKey: [],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {
  data_received: "Total Received",
  data_sent: "Total Sent",
  downstream_bps: "Avg Received/Sec",
  upstream_bps: "Avg Sent/Sec",
  total_bps: "Avg Total Sent/Sec",
  avg_data_received: "Avg Received/Req (B)",
  avg_data_sent: "Avg Sent/Req  (B)"

})

from(bucket: "LPS_Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "windowed_requests")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["plan_name"], set: ${plan_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["round_name"], set: ${round_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["iteration_name"], set: ${iteration_name:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

panels.description: Windowed latency metrics per cooldown period

targets.query:
from(bucket: "LPS_Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "windowed_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${aggregation}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["plan_name"], set: ${plan_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["round_name"], set: ${round_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["iteration_name"], set: ${iteration_name:json}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "metric"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "windowed_response_codes")

from(bucket: "LPS_Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "windowed_data_transfer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["plan_name"], set: ${plan_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["round_name"], set: ${round_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["iteration_name"], set: ${iteration_name:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "LPS_Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cumulative_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "${aggregation}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["plan_name"], set: ${plan_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["round_name"], set: ${round_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["iteration_name"], set: ${iteration_name:json}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "metric"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "LPS_Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cumulative_requests")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["plan_name"], set: ${plan_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["round_name"], set: ${round_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["iteration_name"], set: ${iteration_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "max_concurrent_requests" or r["_field"] == "requests_per_second" or r["_field"] == "requests_rate_per_cooldown" or r["_field"] == "error_rate")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "LPS_Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cumulative_data_transfer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["plan_name"], set: ${plan_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["round_name"], set: ${round_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["iteration_name"], set: ${iteration_name:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "downstream_bps" or r["_field"] == "total_bps" or r["_field"] == "upstream_bps")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "LPS_Metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cumulative_requests")
  |> keep(columns: ["plan_name"])
  |> unique(column: "plan_name")
